content.description:
Compare how global economic forces influence policies in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

In your response, you should do the following.

Define economic globalization.

Explain how state membership in an international economic organization has influenced economic policies in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

Explain why each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (B) would choose state membership in an international economic organization.
content.question:

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
